title: The Anti Drift // Are You Drifting? // Anchored // Michael Todd
description:
Today we continued in our series, Anchored. We heard about many powerful stories of Paul, who went through many storms and still remained Anchored in God. 2021 is the year of the ANTI-DRIFT and today we learned how to avoid getting carried away by the enemies schemes and lies. If you want to be Anchored in God this year, this message is for you! We encourage you to share this message with your friends and family!

Join us for service online every Sunday at 11am (CST) and on Monday’s for Monday Night Prayer at 6pm (CST).

If you received Christ through this message, text SAVED to 828282.

We would love to hear how God is touching your life through this ministry! Share your story with us by emailing mystory@transformchurch.us!

If you would like to support TC financially you can give through the TC app, or online through our website by clicking here https://transformchurch.us/give/. Text ‘GIVE’ to 828282 to give using your mobile device.

If you need prayer, email prayer@transformchurch.us!

For more information about Transformation Church, visit transformchurch.us or follow us on our social media platforms below.

Instagram- https://www.instagram.com/wearetransformation/?hl=en
Facebook- https://www.facebook.com/wearetransformation/

15:11 - Colossians Chapter 3 Verse 23
15:20 - Philippians Chapter 4 Verse 19
15:30 - 2 Corinthians Chapter 5 Verse 17
15:48 - Philippians Chapter 4 Verse 6
16:23 - Corinthians Chapter 13 Verse 4
19:27 - Acts Chapter 27 Verses 10 and 11
20:08 - Ignoring GOD’S WARNING Always Leaves You WRECKED
26:39 - 2021 Is The Year Of The ANTI-DRIFT
- The Myth Of The DRIFT
- Your DRIFT In Private Affects Others In PUBLIC
37:34 - DRIFT VS. DECISION
39:03 - James Chapter 1 Verses 13 through 15
44:58 - DRIFTING Begins When OBEDIENCE To God ENDS
45:12 - Acts Chapter 27 Verse 13
46:32 - ARROGANCE Is The PRIMARY Ingredient That Will Make You ASSUME You Can Take ACTION Without God
53:56 - CLOSE Obedience Isn’t Close ENOUGH
55:12 - 2 Timothy Chapter 3 Verse 1 through 4
56:56 - Acts 27 Verse 14 through 15
59:02 - DON’T Give Up Because You’ve DRIFTED Into A STORM
01:01:05 - Acts Chapter 27 Verses 18 through 20
01:01:25 - What Matters In The CALM Doesn’t Matter In CRISIS
01:02:08 - Acts Chapter 27 Verses 21 and 22
- TAKE COURAGE The Loss Doesn’t Mean You Lose
01:07:15 - Acts Chapter 27 Verses 23 through 26
01:08:07 - Acts Chapter 27 Verses 43 and 44
01:10:48 - I Got PEACE With MY PIECE
01:18:02 - JESUS Is The ONLY ONE Who Gives PEACE In The STORM
